title: Addams on vote for women - cause

content.question: The concerns Addams raises in the excerpt were most directly a reaction to which of the following?

choices.label: Social injustice and rising economic inequality
The expansion of government regulation of corporations
The transformation of rural society by mechanized agriculture
Fears about the growing number of immigrants in the United States

content.answer: Social injustice and rising economic inequality

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify  a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
